thread.title: Secrets from the set of The Tonight Show
thread.title_full: Secrets from the set of The Tonight Show

title: Secrets from the set of The Tonight Show
text:
The Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon: What happens when the cameras aren’t rolling? Matt Young news.com.au The Tonight Show with Jimmy Fallon: What happens when the cameras aren’t rolling? Matt Young news.com.au A good egg: Jimmy Fallon is just as down to earth in person as he is on the Tonight Show. 
HE’S one of the world’s most favourite late-night talk show host, and with good reason. 
For six years Jimmy Fallon has been entertaining night owls across the globe with hilarious skits and celebrity interviews on The Tonight Show. 
Dubbed, “the class clown with top grades and a good heart” by the New York Times ’ Alessandra Stanley, Fallon has successfully steered his career from the funny guy on Saturday Night Live to beloved TV host. 
And while 3.65 million Americans alone welcome him into their home, what happens when Jimmy Fallon welcomes us into his “home”? 
Last week, we scored a coveted spot in the Tonight Show audience, and here’s what you don’t see behind the scenes. 
SCORING TICKETS
